Package tourguideservice.proxy

Interface LocationServiceProxy

  • @Service
@FeignClient(value="location-service",
             url="${tourguide.locationservice.url}",
             configuration=CustomFeignClientConfiguration.class)
public interface LocationServiceProxy
    Feign Client Proxy for LocationService.
